articles.title: National Park Service drops free admission on MLK Day, Juneteenth while adding Trump’s birthday
articles.description:
Some civil rights leaders voiced opposition to the change after news about it began spreading over the weekend.

The post National Park Service drops free admission on MLK Day, Juneteenth while adding Trump’s birthday appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Trump awards medals to the Kennedy Center honorees
articles.description:
This year's recipients are actor Sylvester Stallone, singers Gloria Gaynor and George Strait, the rock band Kiss and actor-singer Michael Crawford.

The post Trump awards medals to the Kennedy Center honorees appeared first on Boston.com.
